title: Ranked 5 Promotion/LP problem

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body:
Hey I was hoping that someone from Riot could post or have a look at my situation. A few days ago my mates and I played 3 Ranked 5 games and won them all while in promos yet we did not get promoted. An hour or 2 later Ranked 5's went down so I understand that there was a problem. Now that Ranked 5's are back up the wins we got we got are not updated on our ladder score. Any help or look would be greatly appreciated. Cheers.
[17 wins 19 games](http://imgur.com/oHUb5Gj)
[Last 3 wins to be promoted](http://imgur.com/t0TDiax)
[Only 14 wins now and last games were losses](http://imgur.com/fCHiMDZ)

**EDIT 1**
Ok just incase you need proof of the games that they exist here are the links
[Game 1](http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/105987256/208133702)
[Game 2](http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/106059514/208133702)
[Game 3](http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/106070266/208133702)

**EDIT 2**
We submitted a ticket a few days ago, and got a response that we're fairly sure was automated, I'll post the link below. I just want this matter resolved whether we get the wins and get promoted or have the games not count and have to win another 3 in a row. It has nearly been 24 hours since posting this and I would greatly appreciate a response. Cheers.
[Response to ticket](http://puu.sh/kvtjp/b769a4b4be.png)

**EDIT 3**
@Riot can you please respond to this? Is this the fault of your infamous spaghetti code? I would really love a response whether it is an email or responding to this post. Just want to know whats happening, and this post has been up for 2 days now. I understand it's the long weekend and world's is on, but I've seen Rioters comment on other posts. Cheers.

**EDIT 4**
@Riot as you did not reply or anything, can you at least remove and delete Xerath from League of Legends as he is the cost muntly champion there is.

**EDIT 5**
Unresolved

replies.body: To prevent further bumping of an old topic, I'll be closing this thread. Please [submit a new thread](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/submit) if you have any issues or would like to continue discussion regarding this topic.
I would also like to know what is going on :)
This is very interesting! Hopefully Rito provides an answer :)
A few friends of mine had the same problem, Hope it gets resolved.
I would like to see this matter resolved.
it looks like all the proof is there. you guys should get promoted.
This makes me scared to play, my team are currently in thier platinum promos and if this happened to us we'd be kinda frustrated, best of luck guys
Wow that sucks, looking through the thread you guys have clearly won your promos and deserve diamond, Fingers crossed rito fixes it for you guys
This sounds like a serious problem, RITO PLS!
This is extremely unfair. I really hope riot will help.
I don't see a reason as to why they can't give you your deserved rank. Hopefully human beings respond this time.
